name: Total Price in Words for WooCommerce
author: Ahmed Imran

sections.description:
This plugin converts the total price to words in WooCommerce, providing a clear and comprehensible representation of the cost for your customers.

Features

  • Enhance customer experience: Display the total price in words to eliminate confusion and improve understanding.
  • Increased trust and confidence: Transparently present the comprehensive breakdown of the total cost, building trust with your customers.
  • Improved accessibility: Cater to customers who may struggle with interpreting numeric values, such as those with language barriers or visual impairments.
  • Customizable display options: Adapt the appearance of the total price in words to align with your store’s branding and design.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the “total-price-in-words-for-woocommerce” folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the WooCommerce settings page and configure the Total Price in Words plugin to suit your preferences.
sections.faq:
Q: How does this plugin convert the total price to words?
A: The Total Price in Words plugin uses a dynamic algorithm to convert the total price into words based on the chosen language and currency settings.

Q: Can I customize the appearance of the displayed total price in words?
A: Yes, you can customize the display options of the total price in words to match your store’s branding and design. Check the plugin settings for customization options.
sections.changelog:
1.2.1 ( Mar 21, 2024 )

  • Added: WooCommerce PDF Invoices & Packing Slips plugin by WP Overnight compatibility.
  • Added: Challan – PDF Invoice & Packing Slip for WooCommerce By WebAppick compatibility.

1.2.0 ( Mar 15, 2024 )

  • PSR-4 Standard implemented.

1.1.3 ( Jan 26, 2024 )

  • Code refactoring for improved readability.
  • Tested: Compatibility with WooCommerce 8.5.

1.1.2 ( Jan 01, 2024 )

  • Added: Implemented Total Price in Words functionality on the WooCommerce Email.

1.1.1 ( Dec 30, 2023 )

  • Fixed: View Order page issue fixed.

1.1.0 ( Dec 17, 2023 )

  • Tested: Compatibility with WooCommerce 8.4.
  • Enhanced: Management of the Currency Handler.

1.0.3 ( Dec 13, 2023 )

  • Added: Implemented Total Price in Words functionality on the Cart page.

1.0.2 ( Dec 02, 2023 )

  • Added: WooCommerce HPOS Compatibility.

1.0.1 ( Nov 24, 2023 )

  • Code refactoring for improved readability.
  • Tested compatibility with WooCommerce version 8.3.

1.0.0 ( Nov 21, 2023 )

  • Initial release.
